title: Macy's same-store sales top expectations, shares jump
text:
Macy's same-store sales top expectations, shares jump 12:38am IST - 01:03 
Macy's reported higher-than-expected same-store sales growth for the fourth quarter and forecast a return to annual comparable sales growth in 2018, sending shares higher. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
Macy's reported higher-than-expected same-store sales growth for the fourth quarter and forecast a return to annual comparable sales growth in 2018, sending shares higher. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2CLZo8y
